label: 白拍子
本: Yoshiwara: The Glittering World of the Japanese Courtesan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1993
説明文: Dancer/courtesans of the late-Heian period to the sixteenth century. Their trademark was the man's white ceremonial robe called suikan and, in the early days, the tall black ceremonial hat, eboshi. [水干、烏帽子]
